mapper.select: SELECT A.SQNO ,A.TST_CASE_ID ,A.MDFC ,A.RQS_PCK_NM ,A.SCS_YN ,A.ERR_MSG_CNT ,CASE WHEN B.RQS_PCK_NM IS NULL THEN '2차' ELSE '1차' END AS SQN_CD FROM rls_pck_lst A LEFT OUTER JOIN open_pck_lst B ON B.RQS_PCK_NM = A.RQS_PCK_NM AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID WHERE A.RQS_ID = #{rqs_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} ORDER BY 7, A.RQS_PCK_NM
SELECT NVL(MAX(CAST(A.RQS_ID AS INT))+1,'1000000000') AS MAX_RQS_ID FROM rls_rqs_mng A WHERE A.BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}
